Class ErrorPageFilterSelectionTest

java.lang.Object
  com.meltmedia.cadmium.servlets.ErrorPageFilterSelectionTest

public class ErrorPageFilterSelectionTest
extends java.lang.Object

Tests the selection of the proper error page by the ErrorPageFilter servlet.

Author:
Christian Trimble

beforeTest

public void beforeTest()
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       javax.servlet.ServletException
Mock up the content service for the error pages and create the filter.

Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - if there is a problem initializing the filter.
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem mocking the content service.

testFilterChainError

public void testFilterChainError()
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 javax.servlet.ServletException
Calls doFilter on the ErrorPageFilter, capturing the output. The output is compared to the expected output.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error in the test.
javax.servlet.ServletException - if there is an error in the test.
